column2: *Edo diligently searches the scene, and despite being bothered by the truck’s blinding headlights, sniffs out something*
column6: *Edo stares at you till you walk over. You see what he’s found, tiny gray flecks on the ground. Scales… or maybe feathers, hard to tell* [end]
column8: *You walk over to see what he’s found. Tiny gray flecks on the ground. Scales… or maybe feathers, hard to tell*
column9: *You walk over to see what he’s found. Tiny gray flecks on the ground. Scales… or maybe feathers, hard to tell*
column13: *You walk over to see what he’s found. Tiny gray flecks on the ground. Scales… or maybe feathers, hard to tell*
column18: *One of the technicians walks over to Edo, and bags up something from the ground. They walk over and hand it to you*
column20: “No prob.” *Inside the bag, some small gray flecks. Looks like scales maybe… or feathers?* [end]
column22: *Looking inside the bag, you notice some small gray flecks. Looks like scales of some sort, or maybe feathers* [end]
